generatedPrompts.backCover: A simple and elegant watercolor design showing two party hats, one slightly larger than the other, resting side-by-side on a soft, fluffy cloud against a pale blue sky. A single, delicate gold ribbon drifts gently from the hats across the center of the image. The style is minimal and serene, with soft flowing colors, artistic brush strokes, paper texture, and organic paint bleeds. The design provides peaceful closure, with decorative elements focused on the center and left, leaving the bottom-right corner completely empty.
generatedPrompts.frontCover:
A whimsical watercolor illustration of two cartoon characters, a happy grandmother with stylish gray hair and a joyful baby girl, both wearing matching party hats and floating up towards a giant, shared birthday cake in the sky. The grandmother is holding the baby's hand, and they are both looking at each other with amusement. Below them is a soft, dreamy landscape of rolling hills. In the center of the sky, the text "Happy Birthday" is written in a beautiful, clearly readable handwritten cursive script. The style is 2D flat art with a full-bleed background, featuring a soft watercolor aesthetic with flowing colors, artistic brush strokes, paper texture, and organic paint bleeds. Key elements are positioned safely away from the edges.

CRITICAL CHARACTER REFERENCE INSTRUCTIONS: I have provided multiple reference photos as input images. You MUST create cartoon/illustrated characters that accurately represent the people in these reference photos with high fidelity to their appearance.

MANDATORY CHARACTER MATCHING REQUIREMENTS:
- REPRESENT ALL PEOPLE: If multiple reference photos are provided, create cartoon versions of ALL people shown, bringing them together in the same scene
- EXACT hair color, hair style, and hair length from each reference photo
- PRECISE facial features for each person: eye color, eye shape, nose shape, face structure, skin tone
- ACCURATE clothing: replicate the EXACT clothing items, colors, patterns, and styles worn by each person in their reference photo
- COMPLETE accessories: include ALL accessories visible on each person (glasses, jewelry, hats, watches, bags, etc.)
- CORRECT body proportions and posture as shown for each person in their reference
- FAITHFUL age representation and gender presentation for each individual
- AUTHENTIC facial expressions and poses from the reference images, lean towards making the people look happier unless the user specifically asks for a different expression
- GROUP COMPOSITION: If multiple people, arrange them naturally together in a pleasing composition that fits the card's theme

include them both as fun cartoon, make us look happy, make sure the women looks her age but does not have excessive wrinkles 


The cartoon style should be charming and artistic while preserving complete visual accuracy to the reference photo. Every person in the reference must be represented with their exact appearance, clothing, and accessories.
generatedPrompts.leftInterior: A creative watercolor illustration of a single large, whimsical calendar page. The date is circled with a heart made of two intertwined lines, one gold and one pink, symbolizing two birthdays on one day. The rest of the calendar dates are blurred softly into the background. A few playful, stylized stars and confetti pieces seem to float around the circled date. The artwork has a humorous and lighthearted tone, executed in a watercolor style with soft flowing colors, artistic brush strokes, paper texture, and organic paint bleeds. The design is abstract and innovative, with no people.
generatedPrompts.rightInterior: A beautiful watercolor design where the message is framed by an artistic representation of a shared spotlight. A gentle, circular wash of soft golden light emanates from the center of the page, with whimsical, colorful watercolor confetti appearing to dance and float within its beam. The message is written in the center of this spotlight in an elegant, flowing, and clearly readable handwritten cursive script. The text reads: "Happy Birthday, Audrey! We're starting to think Vivi planned her arrival just so she could share the spotlight with her amazing grandmother. We hope your day is as wonderful as you are! Love, John, Christina, Jasmine, and Jordan". The style is clean and artistic, using soft watercolor washes, paper texture, and organic paint bleeds to create a warm and celebratory feel.
